World","x":1197,"y":509,"ins":[],"inNames":[],"outNames":[],"params":{"text":"Multiply my Pulses and mod them v.1.0
-------------------------------------

Here the main thing is to multiply two pulses which freqs have an integer ratio. You'll obtain more harmonics. I do then sum them too and modulate the mult of the signals to FM them with Sine and Pulse generators.

The rest is playing with Filter CO (move "Co fact" and "Co base" knobs) and Holding technique to add other freqs before the ADSR. Maxime's Stereo Delay makes it more impressive.

Enjoy, 

(a or not b)"}}}}
